website_summaries.verdict: A sleek frameless door that's as fashionable as it is functional.
pros: Clear glass gives a fresh, modern look
cons: Not easy to install on your own, so we recommend hiring a pro

customer_reviews.title: WARNING: Low Rail!!!
customer_reviews.text: This door is very heavy, and all things considered great quality. Here is what I didn't count on: the door is 74', but the rail is at 70'. So the picture shows it in a curbless shower, which is what we just installed. BUT if you are 6 feet tall, you have to duck under the rail. SO disappointed. The final touch on our new bathroom, and we blew it. It is a great door, and I love it's appearance, but it needs to be 4"inches taller to compensate for the hardware (rail).
customer_reviews.author: Lisa H.

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably priced Shower door but difficult to install
customer_reviews.text: The price was less than half of what shower door dealers in the Las Vegas area wanted for their doors but my contactor had a difficult time installing it and to compensate for his out of plumb tile shower remodel, he installed the rolling door side higher than the fixed door and now the door wants to stay open and roll on its own. We have to use rubber door stops to place under the rollers so that it will stay closed while showering. Also, the steel bar that the door rolls on is not stiff or strong enough and tends to sage from the heavy weight of the shower door.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking door, description does not coincide with the product.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful door, sadly the description says that VIGO glass is treated and does not leave water drop marks but when water dries the drop marks stay. Don't put something in the description and then say the opposite in the questions and answers section. Also, a part was missing I called to report it and was told to prove it........ How do I prove it? Am I supposed to make a video of every delivered box I get?
customer_reviews.author: Caonabo V.

customer_reviews.title: Time consuming to intall
customer_reviews.text: Installation...for one. No wonder they say have a professional install. It's so that the purchaser doesn't see how long it takes. The pic doesn't show how many plastic edges there are on most sides of the glass. Makes the doors look cheap. The guide on the bottom has a pass through for water as it runs down off of stationary door and onto threshold of movable door....no reason for pass thru...it should be closed in. I put clear silicone in it to make it keep water out of movable side
customer_reviews.author: cheryl marie samas

customer_reviews.title: How to eliminate the water running onto my floor.
customer_reviews.text: There is a space between both doors. One door is stationary and the other door slides to gain entry. The water hits again the door that slides and gets on the outside and run down to the floor. I sent the seller two messages about suggestions and received no replies. Very disappointed that no suggestions were given to eliminate the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Laverne Richards

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking shower- poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: The hardware is good quality with the exception of the screws (I used my own). The plastic flanges are cheap looking but the glass and hardware look great. I bought this for $999.90 and then saw the next day it was listed at $849.90. No price match guarantee and the seller and Vigo both deflect responsibility to the other party. I would not want to have to deal with a return. Your expense to mail it back plus 20% restocking fee. Overall a nice looking shower door and I like its adjustability. The directions are pretty terrible but I figured it out. I installed it myself. It would be easier with 2 but is doable alone.
customer_reviews.author: adrian s.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality - heavy and modern
customer_reviews.text: This is a gorgeous, heavy and modern-looking shower door. Be aware that when it's delivered it comes in two boxes attached to a pallet, so you'll need two strong men to carry the boxes inside once they remove them from the pallet. Once it was installed what I did notice is that the moving side (one side is stationary) doesn't stay open, not that it needs to, but it's strange as you're getting out of the shower that the door closes behind you! It must be the weight of the door! Don't hesitate though it's nice - a custom look for an Amazon price!
customer_reviews.author: D. Hylton

customer_reviews.title: WOW! very nice
customer_reviews.text: This door is very nice! I would recommend this sliding door to anyone looking to upgrade to elegance. I installed this door myself but needed some help moving and placing the door in its proper position. Very heavy. 140lbs per section. The slider works great. Very smooth and easy to adjust to wall. Meets and exceeds my expections. Amazon shipped this by freight carrier ABF. No problems with transit. Driver helped deliver to my door and opened boxes to inspect for damage. Well packed and protected.
customer_reviews.author: L. SCHINDLER

customer_reviews.title: Great quality shower door at a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shower door. The glass is super thick and sturdy once installed. The rollers work extremely well and provides a smooth door opening experience. Highly recommend. We bought the stainless steel version and it looks great in the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Mar

customer_reviews.title: Best part of our bathroom remodel
customer_reviews.text: Best part of our bathroom remodel! We have strange sized doors so only a few companies produce doors to fit it properly. Buying online I wasn’t sure but hoped for the best. Glass is thick and does not streak after use - contractor seemed to have an easy enough time with install. They just look amazing! On a recent weekend away happy to say these doors looked better than our hotel shower doors on 5th Avenue in NYC! Very pleased with these doors look and operation.
customer_reviews.author: Tber

customer_reviews.title: Great quality shower door, terrible instructions
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and good quality shower door but the instructions are terrible! You're better off looking at a picture of it assembled and just figure out where the pieces go. Directions throw you off and eventually you realize it's very easy to put together. Due to the weight of the glass you would need two people, minimum to help.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Smooth, solid quality shower door
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this sight unseen for a bathroom renovation with some worries about whether the quality would meet my expectations, and whether or not it would survive the shipping process. Both worries are now distant memories and this beautiful shower door is now fully installed and performing its intended duty for the past two weeks. The materials are exceptionally durable and heavy, and the door slides smoothly and effortlessly. Yes, this door is expensive compared to other products, but the quality is so much better than what I could find in local showrooms and hardware stores. If you're looking for a top notch shower door, look no further because this is it.
customer_reviews.author: The Meatball

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love these doors, they fit perfect in our not so square shower. Make sure to install so that the door stays closed when you want it too, so a little off of level towards the door being closed, we had our builder reinstall it so the door didn't keep swinging open.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you have enough space to get in
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, but didn't work for use because of our shower's configuration (toilet near front, shower seat at back). Doors don't slide all the way. Opening would have been too narrow to easily enter and exit. Measure before ordering - at 155 pounds, you don't want to have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: waited 2 months for the delivery but it did arrive in time for my contractor to install. I cannot say enough about how much I love the quality of this piece. Only a week in so cannot say if it will still look as great 2 years from now. It glides smoothly with no noise and makes the room look very high end. AMAZON PRIME ROCKS DELIVERY! I ordered almost my entire bathroom on Amazon and even this 300lb delivery they handled with ease.
customer_reviews.author: judith

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect after dialing it all in
customer_reviews.text: Overall pretty good! Had our contractor install 2 of these. One works great, one slides back a bit but the contractor said he can adjust to balance it out. It was a recommended product by the contractor and he’s installed many of them. Overall we are very happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well Made, Looks Good
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice shower door. We needed a shower door to fit an opening that was 62". This allowed for that, most others don't. Works great, slides smoothly and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: DDDuster

customer_reviews.title: Sliding Hinged Shower 52 x 74
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful shower door. It is defintely a two person job, as the doors are rather heavy. The door completes our new bathroom! Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you need to make it more narrow the metal bar is pretty sturdy and tough to cut through
customer_reviews.text: It is VERY heavy. If you need to make it more narrow the metal bar is pretty sturdy and tough to cut through. There is an extra piece of stripping that needs to go on the metal strip to add some tension to the sliding door that is not explained in the instructions. All common sense stuff but better if you know it up front. Otherwise we are very happy. There is enough space between the door overlap to get your hand jn to keep it clean too
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Best frameless shower door for easy DIY too.
customer_reviews.text: High quality product, look nice and sliding door slides extremely smooth. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: darien72

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shower door
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shower door. Easy to install, but have a helper ready because the panels are heavy. The instructions don't show it, but you can flip the panels so that the water doesn't flow toward the open gap. Easy enough. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: doobs

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: This shower door is beautiful and sleek in our small master bathroom. It glides effortlessly on the track and is great because unlike regular sliding shower doors there is no track that runs along the entire length of the base so it doesn't get grimey or gross. We were doing a bathroom remodel so our general contractor installed this for us. He even loves the look and said he plans to recommend this to future clients.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Love the price, super reasonable for a 72" sliding shower door. 3/8 inches thickness makes it durable and solid. Nothing to complaint for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Monkeycat

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and looks fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Really well engineered door and parts. Easy to install and looks fantastic. Watch the Vigo installation video two or three times, its far more helpful than the written instructions. If you have the right tools its not much more than a hour job for two people.
customer_reviews.author: Mark J. Scholes

customer_reviews.title: My new lovely Shower Doors
customer_reviews.text: Two hours to install But it was all worth it beautiful looks great quality excellent
customer_reviews.author: Afela

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: This shower door is beautiful. The quality is exceptional and it looks fantastic in my bathroom. We had it instslled professionally. It works like a dream, opens and closes very smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Orr

customer_reviews.title: Low rail warning!
customer_reviews.text: Like some others have stated before, this shower has a low rail. My shower has a 3-4" curb, and even with that, my head just barley misses the rail. I am 6'2", so if you are taller, watch out even with a shower curb! Other than that, the shower looks fantastic and the materials are quality.
customer_reviews.author: Elliott S.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product and contemporary design.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the design of this product--looks great, door and hardware is heavy duty, slides easily. My brother installed the this shower door; he said it was a little difficult and not as easy as he thought (he's a carpenter) and needed various adjustments to get it right, but it was definitely worth it in the end.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Good design
customer_reviews.text: Well made and very well designed. My wife and I installed the door without any assistance. Carefull planning, however, is a must. Looks great. Thanks Vigo.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Nice door
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good value for the price. Tried to find one locally but couldn't. Installed with a little help from a second person. The directions seem a little illogical but they work.
customer_reviews.author: S. Blumenschein

customer_reviews.title: Sweet
customer_reviews.text: I installed the door myself but would recommend 2 people. Hardest part of the install was drilling through the tile. We love the finished product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the look. Operates smoothly.  Installation wasn't that bad.
customer_reviews.text: Gets great compliments from everyone who sees it. Exactly the look we were going for. Not really that hard to install as long as you have 2 people and at least review the directions. Took us about 5 hours start to finish.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and works well. Have had it for over a year with no problems yet. Contractor invented a few new words during install, but, he liked the end result.
customer_reviews.author: DADGadd

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shower doors
customer_reviews.text: They’re beautiful and great to use. This style and their weight makes for tough installation but that should be expected.
customer_reviews.author: DenMac

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: We needed two people to put this up. However we took our time and followed the instructions. It went together beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: Definitely need two people to put together, but its very pretty. Took about 4-5 hours to get it right, but we did it
customer_reviews.author: Nancy D. Smetana

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Shower Door
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful door, excellent construction. NOTE: it will take two people to install so make sure you have a buddy available. Easy enough to adjust for walls that are not plumb.
customer_reviews.author: joenupe

customer_reviews.title: Hard pass
customer_reviews.text: The doors are nice but impossible to get straight. The company is also really not helpful with any questions or help.
customer_reviews.author: IA

customer_reviews.title: Unit very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Installed myself. Unit very easy to install. Does require some help lifting and moving the doors, as they are heavy! Very happy with enclosure.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful 3/8" glass
customer_reviews.text: Was not completely aware of the fact that only one of the 2 glass panels were fixed n did not slide. Top notch quality material. Definitely a 2 person job. Incredibly clean look when finished.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Ward

customer_reviews.title: GREAT DOOR
customer_reviews.text: easy to install and adjust but definitely read through the instructions and understand them before hand. The only thing I needed help with is to have my husband lift the doors on the rail.
customer_reviews.author: shila

customer_reviews.title: do not buy from eFaucets; it will provide no customer service
customer_reviews.text: a fastener on the shower door has failed. eFaucets will take no responsibility and the manufacturer is dragging its feet. I would not order this product through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: beautiful sliding glass door
customer_reviews.text: This is very heavy, high quality, beautiful sliding glass door. We love it, be careful and follow the instruction step by step. I wish it had a handle inside the shower just like it has outside!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elsa

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: High-quality, well-made. Door opens and closes smoothly and very quietly. Looks great in our bathroom, as well. Customer service with Vigo was excellent. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: P. Callahan

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite piece in my renovated bathroom. So sturdy and well constructed. Everyone comments how beautiful it is!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: These are great
customer_reviews.text: We recently remodeled our bathroom and put in a 7' dual shower and these doors were perfect. We have them at 6' and they work very well. Our contractor installed them and was very complementary of the design and how well made they were.
customer_reviews.author: Tm

customer_reviews.title: Self install glass door
customer_reviews.text: Great product and not too difficult to install with the right tools and goodb handyman experience. Some good suction cup glass lifters. Saved over $1000 doing this install myself.
customer_reviews.author: Clarence Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful once installed but not as easy to install as specified. The rollers are smooth, door is quiet-we love it.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle C.

customer_reviews.title: Exquisite and well built equipment.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely need 2 , maybe 3, people to install. Helps to watch the short youtube video on installation.
customer_reviews.author: The Swedenese

customer_reviews.title: exactly what the customer hoped for
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, well packaged. Installed easily enough. and again, our customer was happy. Win win.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer3002

customer_reviews.title: Contemporary and well built
customer_reviews.text: Love the look! It’s very well made and slides with the touch of a finger. Beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Helt

customer_reviews.title: Bar has to be leveled, then it is easy.
customer_reviews.text: Difficulte to reach the ONE hole to adjust the rollers, it should have 4 holes at 90 degrees from each other.
customer_reviews.author: K. Lev

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks and functions great. It's the showcase piece of our newly renovated bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Dexter Riley

customer_reviews.title: Great shower door
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to install, looks great! Mid remodel pic, but the door looks great, functions well.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Goad

customer_reviews.title: Love this door.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this door, and very impressed with the thickness of the glass, not chintzy.
customer_reviews.author: Rene Spagnolo

customer_reviews.title: Door and hardware all look and work great but installation was tricky
customer_reviews.text: Door and hardware all look and work great but installation was tricky. If you don't read ALL instructions before starting, installation would be very difficult!
customer_reviews.author: Lora Brown

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: absolutely first class and beautiful...you can not beat the price
customer_reviews.author: CC Florida

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended! I was very nervous installing it because of ...
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended! I was very nervous installing it because of risking breaking the glass. I works great and looks really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great door for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great door for the money. It looks like a door that a professional glass door company installs for $2500. Its solid and rolls smoothly and easily.
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It looked good and works great. The customer is very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: The shower door came out better than expected
customer_reviews.text: The shower door came out better than expected. Considering that a custom shower door was 4 times the price, I would choose this door every time. You can't tell it's not custom. Definently need 2 people to install but was easier than anticipated. Great product for a great price. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: brock s.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice heavy door. It makes me happy every time i close it.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Dionne

customer_reviews.title: These doors look very nice: ) Mechanism is kinda noisy and I suspect ...
customer_reviews.text: These doors look very nice:) Mechanism is kinda noisy and I suspect that lower edge scratches the marble saddle. I am a little scared to slam it against walls. I hope it will perform well for a long time. It's rather expensive!
customer_reviews.author: enemyofthesame

customer_reviews.title: Expensive and do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Very poor instructions. Terrible customer service. Leaks from all sides....
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: easy to install
customer_reviews.text: very strong frame and 1/2" thick glass door and easy to install, highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: VIGO Elan 64 to 68-in. Frameless Sliding Shower Door with .375-in. Clear Glass and Chrome Hardware
product_meta.description:
Size:68 x 74| Color:ChromeMake your bathroom an oasis with a VIGO Sliding Shower Door. This contemporary shower door combines a sleek frameless design, with superior quality clear tempered glass. Wall mount brackets adjust to accommodate out-of-plumb walls, making it possible to have a seemless installation. Stainless steel construction hardware will not rust, chip or scratch off and is guaranteed for life. Specially designed rollers make door closing smooth and effortless and a top rail support ensures wall anchoring and reinforces wall stability. Clear seal strips keep the shower watertight, preventing leakage. With reversible left or right-sided installation and an adjustable opening up to 4 inches, you have an option to meet your exact needs. Bring your showering experience to the next level by adding a VIGO shower panel and create your own personal oasis.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
VIGO is a leading luxury kitchen and bath products manufacturer where exceptional design meets durability.
Headquartered in the USA - the VIGO brand seamlessly marries stylish plumbing solutions with structural dependability in a unique, refined aesthetic. Our engineers stay at the forefront of technology and design by providing you only the newest and most stylish products on the market in an array of finishes. Our experts know that only the best designs and highest quality materials can meet the way you live your life. When you choose to bring a VIGO product into your home, you are instantly creating a level of sophistication, confidence, and strength that only VIGO can deliver. Guaranteed to meet your needs and your style - the majority of our products include a limited lifetime warranty. With over 25 years combined experience in the industry, VIGO has immediately established its reputation by delivering sophisticated and affordable kitchen and bath products with exceptional quality and extraordinary innovation. Each and every product goes through rigorous tests and trials to ensure that only the utmost quality and performance is delivered to your home. Many of our products are certified and follow mandatory industry standards. We strive for perfection, and know that every kitchen and bath deserves the best.
At VIGO, we strive to:
1. Design and deliver the most luxurious, dependable kitchen and bath products 

2. Lead efforts in design and innovation across all relevant industry channels

3. Provide the best in customer service and product satisfaction 
When everything comes together - it's no wonder why VIGO is one of the fastest growing kitchen and bath product manufacturers in the world. Experience the beauty and performance of VIGO, and witness for yourself why we really are High Design for Every Home.
feature_bullets: Frameless glass design, 64-in. - 68-in. adjustable opening, Door Width 35.625-in., Door Height 73.5-in., Chrome hardware finish
Wall mount brackets adjust to accommodate out-of-plumb walls, .375-in. clear tempered glass
Stainless steel construction hardware will not rust, chip or scratch off, guaranteed for life
Specially designed rollers make door closing smooth and effortless, Top rail support ensures wall anchoring and reinforces wall stability
Discrete door handle mounted on pre-drilled glass
Single water deflector redirects water toward the inside of the shower
Full-length clear seal strips make the shower waterproof where door and side panel overlap, watertight between wall and glass door or fixed panel
ANSI Z97.1 certified, Limited Lifetime Warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars133 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
